Tables.CreateQuery: CREATE TABLE {schema}.Des2_Users (Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY, UserId NVARCHAR(MAX), Email NVARCHAR(MAX), FullName NVARCHAR(MAX), PasswordSalt VARBINARY(MAX), PasswordHash VARBINARY(MAX), AuthenticatorType NVARCHAR(50),Role INT, CreatedDate DATETIME, UpdatedDate DATETIME, DeletedDate DATETIME)
